title: Adrian Ramsay – 2022 Comments on Lula Winning Brazilian Election
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Adrian Ramsay, the Joint Leader of the Green Party, on Twitter on 31 October 2022.
content:
Huge congratulations to [@LulaOficial](https://twitter.com/LulaOficial) on his election as President of Brazil. His victory marks a real sense of hope for the people of Brazil and for protecting the Amazon.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
